article_title: The War Against Work And Wealth

article_metadata.description: The current administration's desire to make it easier for people not to work and to live at taxpayer expense makes no economic sense. It reduces the amount of wealth produced and keeps people from ascending the ladder of individual economic progress.
article_metadata.author: Mark Hendrickson
